external_games.name: Shinsou Noise: Jushin Tantei no Jikenbo

name: Shinsou Noise: Jushin Tantei no Jikenbo
summary: This is the debut game for Azurite. Shizunomiya is a commuter town located on the outskirts of a big city. It has many urban landmarks, while still being full of nature on the seaside. In the middle of this town is Shizunomiya Gakuen, whose students often flock to the city after school to enjoy the wide assortment of entertainment there.
